title: Apple in the Woods
description: “Apple in the Woods”, This fun and magical story is about a dog named Apple, who loves to play in the woods. The woods are magical and as the day progresses, “Apple” makes some new friends, Like Erika the fairy, Josh the cat, and visits a magical pond where one of her new friends learns to swim. Apple’s new friends are not perfect. Apple’s has one ear that stands straight up and one ear that is flopped over. Josh the cat learns to overcome not knowing how to swim.
author: Isabella Media Inc
